title: Improving Your Soil One Amendment at a Time | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Performing soil preparation for a garden
subtasks: Adding organic matter (e.g., compost, composted manure, peat moss, straw) to improve soil drainage and water retention
Raking organic matter into the soil
Rototilling the soil to incorporate organic matter deeply
Applying fertilizers based on soil test results
